rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0001
rows.name: Is this the spot? That's weird.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0002
rows.name: Tatsu don't see anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0003
rows.name: Lin, go ahead and double-check the coordinates, would you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0004
rows.name: R-right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0005
rows.name: (I have a bad feeling about this...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0006
rows.name: Don't tell me—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0007
rows.name: Elma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm picking up multiple incoming heat signatures.
We're surrounded![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0010
rows.name: I knew it... We've been tricked![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0011
rows.name: Lower your weapons, humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0012
rows.name: Haven't seen this species before...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0013
rows.name: Look at cute kitty! Here, kitty kitty![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0014
rows.name: Shut up! They'll hear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0015
rows.name: Your first time laying eyes on the proud people of Wroth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0016
rows.name: Surrender, humans. We have you surrounded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0017
rows.name:
If you put away your weapons and comply, you will be
treated with the respect that warriors of your caliber deserve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0018
rows.name: Do as they say, everyone—we don't have a choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0019
rows.name: (Luxaar's conniving has served them to us on a platter...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0020
rows.name: (Which only makes the task all the less palatable...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0021
rows.name: Elma...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0022
rows.name: Don't worry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0023
rows.name:
I'm in charge here. My subordinates
are of no use to you—I ask that you let them go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Unfortunately, that is not my decision to make.
We are mercenaries. We do as our patron bids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0025
rows.name: I am to deliver all of you to the Ganglion stronghold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0026
rows.name:
I thought the Ganglion wanted all humans eradicated?
Why take us captive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0027
rows.name: An excellent question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0028
rows.name:
The Ganglion are indeed terrified of your species...
However, this fear is only of your natural form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0029
rows.name: Our real bodies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0030
rows.name: But why? Why would they fear our real bodies?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0031
rows.name: This I do not know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0032
rows.name: If I did, I would gladly lay their wretched plans bare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0033
rows.name: Prince Jiarg...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Luxaar never ordered us to keep his secrets.
Only to remember his precious title.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0035
rows.name: Take them away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0036
rows.name: (Luxaar? Is that the Ganglion leader?)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0037
rows.name: Wait. First, I have a question:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0038
rows.name:
How has a noble species such as yours
allowed itself to be reduced to such disgrace?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0039
rows.name: What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0040
rows.name:
The Ganglion have committed unspeakable acts
all across this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0040_2
rows.name: Surely, you must know that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0041
rows.name: They kill without cause or mercy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0042
rows.name:
Why would you serve such scoundrels?
Why sink so low?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Mind your tone, human.
Who are you to judge the Prince's actions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0044
rows.name: What could you possibly know of our people's struggle?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0045
rows.name: Of how our homeland was torn away from us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0046
rows.name:
It's true, I cannot say I understand your plight.
But humanity lost its home, just like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0047
rows.name: And yet we chose to stand up and fight the Ganglion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0049
rows.name:
The Ganglion have bought our compliance, yes. But make
no mistake—the Wrothians would never sell their pride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0050
rows.name: Prove it, then. Make a choice here that you can be proud of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0051
rows.name:
The Ganglion would have us dismiss you
as uncultured savages.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0052
rows.name: But I see reason in your words, and strength in your bearing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0053
rows.name: Very well. We will settle this the old way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0054
rows.name: Defeat us in battle, and yes—you will also win your freedom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: xs09060100_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree to their challenge.

rows.label: xs09060100_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: xs09060100_SEL0021
rows.name: Say you cannot trust them.

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0055
rows.name: Excellent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0056
rows.name:
I will grant no quarter, and expect none in return.
Mercy would be an insult.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0057
rows.name:
Hmph. A Wrothian never breaks his word, human.
And besides, you forget...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0058
rows.name: You have no choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0059
rows.name: But my prince, win or lose, Luxaar will punish us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0060
rows.name: Forgive me, Buidhe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0061
rows.name: I can suffer those villains' unjust orders no longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0062
rows.name:
Of course we all feel the same, my prince,
but when the Ganglion hear of this—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0063
rows.name:
Wroth will survive.
Ours is a resilient people—we can weather this storm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0064
rows.name: Yes, my prince. With you leading us, yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0065
rows.name: Then it's settled. Let the battle begin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0066
rows.name: This is the Wrothian way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0067
rows.name: And one to be proud of.[ST:wait ]
